EmailTemplate.name: LE-202211-HP-TAR-HEV-Blues-Peer-Insights.non-response-2
EmailTemplate.subject: Save your spot at Blues Peer Insights 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Register today! Blues Peer Insights 2022 November 2-3 | Orlando, FL You still have time to register for our unique event specifically for Blues plan partners, bringing together peers from all over the country. Join us in Orlando and help us come out with bigger and better ideas for how we can serve your members. Topics will include: - Key trends shaping virtual care - Virtual primary care and virtual-first strategies - Vendor evaluation and fatigue - Best practices for ASO team collaboration - Maximizing success for virtual care strategies We hope you’ll join your fellow Blues peers at this invitation‑only event. Space is limited, so register today! Registration closes October 7. Welcome to the epicenter for healthcare innovation The GuideWell Innovation Center <[[https://guidewellinnovation.com/]]> is a 30,000 square-foot hub that provides state-of-the-art coworking and event venue space for innovators and stakeholders across the health spectrum. We are located in Orlando’s Lake Nona Medical City, a prominent health sciences cluster that includes some of the nation’s top hospitals, universities, research institutions and consumer health companies. Your stay is on us! Attendees of this event will have their hotel accommodation covered by Teladoc Health. Lake Nona Wave Hotel 6100 Wave Hotel Drive, Orlando, FL 32827 407-675-2000 Book now <[[https://be.synxis.com/?adult=1&arrive=2022-10-31&chain=25042&child=0&config=Group&currency=USD&depart=2022-11-03&group=2022453&hotel=35155&level=hotel&locale=en-US&rooms=1&theme=Alternate%20Theme]]> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
